GTRACK_worldTransformParams Struct Reference

GTRACK World Transformation. More...

#include <gtrack_int.h>

Data Fields

bool transformationRequired
 boolean to indicate whether transformation to world coordinates space is required
 
GTRACK_rotation_sincos rotX
 structure to hold space rotation angle sine and cosine values
 
float offsetZ
 space vertical move value
 

Detailed Description

GTRACK World Transformation.

The structure defines the transformation from tracking spece to world coordinates in 3D configurations, this transformation is rotation along X axis follwed by move along Z axis
